q: Simon Cowell denied abandoning British audiences by taking the show to America, saying: "I have some ideas" . Cheryl Cole will join him as a judge on the US version, he shrugged his shoulders and said there will be an announcement in a couple of weeks . The night really belonged to Ant and Dec, who won Most Popular Presenters at the National Television Awards for the 10th year running. And the comedy double act also picked up Most Popular Programme

paid clicks were up 11 percent from the prior quarter and 18 percent from the year-ago quarter. "Q4 marked a terrific end to a stellar year," Google CEO Eric Schmidt said in a statement. Our strong performance has been driven by a rapidly growing digital economy, continuous product innovation that benefits both users and advertisers, and by the extraordinary momentum of our newer businesses, such as display and mobile. Google's results may offset the uncertainty surrounding the announcement of Eric Schmidt 's exit on April 4 as CEO. taking over as CEO and will oversee day-to-day operations, including product and technology development. And it was a high stool, so when he fell, he couldn't brace it. So he just( smacked the floor). I think a number of reasons: one, I wasn't, you know- even today, I'm not gon na be the guy who pops out as- you know, I'm not 6' 5 , I'm not 240, I'm don't run a 4.5 40. to share the wealth with its unionized work forces now that they are solidly profitable. It's a harder problem than it seems, since both have become solid moneymakers in part because of worker concessions. It was absolutely owed that we treat our people properly, CEO Sergio Marchionne told analysts and reporters on a conference call, as reported by the Free Press. "The obligation to our people was much greater than the need to improve our bottom line profitability."

In der Kasse liegen mittlerweile 35 Milliarden Dollar. Wir hatten ein starkes Quartal und ein starkes Jahr , sagte Eric Schmidt . "Der Ausblick ist vielversprechend."
